channel.title: Using GetDIBits in Delphi?
channel.description:
I know I could do it in C++ just as easily, but I'm trying it in Delphi.
Well, whenever I try it, it says every pixel is zero (black) any help? You can look around for some docs on it, and I believe there is a tut at cruels in VB.

item.title: Using GetDIBits in Delphi?
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

I’ve done this, took me a while to figure it out, it’s similar to how it’s done in VB but following the VB tutorial completely won’t get you there, just post what you have so far (on the other hand, you’re also pretty good off with scanlines, if used properly there’s not much of a speed difference)

Read full topic

item.title: Using GetDIBits in Delphi?
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

Post erroneous code then.
I rather fix code than write it completely. Unless you really took a shit on it.

Read full topic
